name: OneHundredWordsDrill
0:
”Alexa, launch the one hundred words drill”
”Drill”
”Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: one hundred words drill
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you memorize one hundred important words. The skill does this via drills and quizzes. During a drill, you just listen to the definitions and absorb. During a quiz, it gives you the definition and you respond with the word. At any time, you can say, “Quiz” or “Drill.”

For other drill skills, please go to: http://www.voicedrills.com

This skill was designed and developed by Witlingo. If you have feedback, please send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
